author: antonywm
body:
Have been trying for a long time to access SfBOnline Powershell from MacOS as I've already had to use a Windows VM to access this for years now. Powershell is available for Mac, but this doesn't work.

I installed I've got over the WSMan error by installing the openssl 1.0.0 libraries, and the New-CsOnlineSession now works and authenticates properly - even using web based 2FA. However, it then errors with this:

New-CsOnlineSession: Connecting to remote server api.interfaces.records.teams.microsoft.com failed with the following error message : Client did not get proper response from server. For more information, see the about_Remote_Troubleshooting Help topic.

There is no help for this in the about_Remote_Troubleshooting doc. I can connect to ExchangeOnline fine, so it is just a Teams/SfBO issue. I guess from the URL that this is using the Graph API now but may need something else to get it working on Mac?
title: Can not connect to Skype for Business Online with PowerShell on macOS - Client did not get proper response from server
